name: Portgas.D.Ace
text: On Play: Draw 2 cards and place 2 cards from your hand at the top or bottom of your deck in any order. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader.

effect.text: Draw 2 cards and place 2 cards from your hand at the top or bottom of your deck in any order. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader.
